GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: Take any existing article Id number and returns it with is own characteristics and values

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Takes an existing article Id number and returns its comments if existing, if not returns an empty array

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Adds a comment to a valid article Id.

PATCH: /api/articles/:article_id.description: Updates an article by its id.

DELETE:/api/comments/:comment_id.description: Deletes the given comment by ID.
